Article.Author: By Airy & Da Dark Wizard
Article.Title: An Adventure Begins
Article.Text:
Airy: The earliest I can remember is the void… There was nothing to ponder but your thoughts--if they exist. Nothing to see, nothing to hear, nothing to do…
DaDarkWizard: Leave it to Airy to make an announcement about nothing!
Airy: Then there was a presence! Once we connected, there was hope! Together we would find our way… to someplace!
